Warranty & Support

Price: $31.95 - $23.95
(as of Nov 29,2022 09:23:12 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Lusso Gear Family Favorites

Auto Organization Caddy: A multifunctional car and trunk organizer will help you declutter your floor and passenger seats. This foldable backseat automobile holder gives extra storage to any car in a matter of seconds.
9 Storage Pockets: These Car Organizers offer 2 spacious main bag areas, 1 secure rear zipper pocket, 4 built-in cup holders, and 2 additional front-facing mesh pockets to keep any car interior, console or carseat organized.
Secure Safety Handles: The Lusso Gear Car Organizer comes equipped with a set of 2 handles, comfy enough for small and large hands. Your car’s side and middle seat belts can be clipped through for extra road safety.
Driver’s Best Friend: The uses are endless. Use as a toy or snack tray, a mobile office, or for storing police gear. This collapsible car seat storage organizer can do almost anything.
Built to Last a Lifetime: Every Lusso Gear accessory proudly comes with a lifetime warranty. If you encounter any issue with your Lusso Gear Organizer, simply let us know. We’ll work with you to make it right.

Easy-Carry Handles

Two ergonomic carry handles make it simple to bring the Lusso Gear Car organizer (and everything inside it) just about anywhere.

Collapsible Design

Organizer folds flat in an instant thanks to a space-saving design, allowing for easier transport and convenient storage when not in use.

Secure Safety Straps

Convenient straps allow you to safely and securely clip your organizer into your vehicle seat belt so it stays in place, even during sudden unexpected stops.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $52.99 - $45.04
(as of Nov 29,2022 01:52:45 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Laptop Briefcase for Women

More Styles

About us：

It started with a vision to combine vintage and modern style together seamlessly to create unique and timeless products.

In the fashion world, a trend starts small, but develops fast. We work with some of the top fashion designers to continually innovate and push ECOSUSI further.

Here at ECOSUSI, we began with women’s bags, and overtime, as our brand grows, we will create more unique styles to meet different needs.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 17.83 x 11.97 x 6.42 inches; 2.8 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 20, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ ECOSUSI
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B093F5LVHX
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Leather lining
Buckle closure
LARGE CAPACITY WITH 3 LAYERS: Three layers designed for different use to achieve maximum capacity.The independant padded pocket in the middle protects up to 15.6″ laptop. The other two side compartments ideal for storing all of your essentials.
WELL CONSTRUCTED: Magnetic buckle for a quick access, serveral inside pockets like ipad sleeves and zipped-fastening pockets keeping items well organized.
CONVENIENT & STYLISH: Durable and adjustable handles drop range: 9.4″-13.4″. Nice size admirably suits women and ideal for daily use like shopping/ meeting/ school/ working/ weekend travel/etc.
MATERIAL & DIMENSION: Made of durable vegan leather material. High quality brass-tone hardware, wear-resisting, strong load-bearing. Dimensions: 42 x 13x 30 CM.
WARRANTY: ECOSUSI provides outstanding products and a wonderful buying experience. If you are not satisfied with our product or service for any reason, please reach out and we will attempt to resolve any issues and ensure your contentment.

ECOSUSI Tote Handbag Briefcase for Women Fits 15.6 Inches Laptop

Q&A

1. Does it fit under an airplane seat?

It can easily fit underneath the seat of American Airlines, Southwest Airlines, Delta Airways. And it fits in overhead bin of United Airlines.

2. Is there a protective compartment for computer?

Yes, there’s an independent padded compartment in the middle of the bag to protect your laptop.

3. Are the shoulder straps adjustable?

Yes, the handles are durable and adjustable drop range from 9.4″-13.4″.

4. Can the bag itself stand?

Yes, the bag is made of demi-rigid material, plus, there are 4 feet to protect the bottom surface, it can stand upright on its own.

5. What’s the return policy?

We accept 30 days exchange or full refund for any reason. We committed 1-year product w/arranty from the date of purchase.

FUNCTIONAL LAPTOP PURSE

ALL IN ONE TOTE

You’ll always be prepared with this tote. With signature styling and multi-pockets, this ECOSUSI laptop tote could be a piece you’ll reach for again and again.
